Title: The Three Coolers
Plot: After Bubbie's death, the entire Botwin family sits shiva (the Jewish period of mourning) for seven days. After shiva, Nancy is sent on a mission and takes Andy along with her. Now that shiva is over and Bubbie is gone, Lenny decides to sell the house. Meanwhile, Celia continues her flirtation with Captain Till, and Doug finds refuge with the Botwins.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Joey Wagner Luthman, Albert Brooks, Gloria Garayua
